sn12.15:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā kaccānagotto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn12.15:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā kaccānagotto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn12.15:4.6: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sammādiṭṭhi hotī”ti?
sn12.15:5.3: Lokasamudayaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke natthitā sā na hoti.
sn12.15:5.4: Lokanirodhaṃ kho, kaccāna, yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato yā loke atthitā sā na hoti.
sn12.15:5.5: Upayupādānābhinivesavinibandho khvāyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena.
sn12.15:5.6: Tañcāyaṃ upayupādānaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinivesānusayaṃ na upeti na upādiyati nādhiṭṭhāti:
sn12.15:5.8: ‘Dukkhameva uppajjamānaṃ uppajjati, dukkhaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ nirujjhatī’ti na kaṅkhati na vicikicchati aparapaccayā ñāṇamevassa ettha hoti.
sn12.15:6.3: Ete te, kaccāna, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti:
